title: Word Sense Disambiguation, Parsing, and Semantic Role Labeling in a Multilingual Context

This list focuses on articles published up to 2022 that explore word sense disambiguation, parsing, and semantic role labeling in a multilingual context, with a particular emphasis on semantic relations captured by language models

note: This survey provides a comprehensive overview of cross-lingual WSD techniques.

title: This list provides a starting point for exploring the intersection of multilingual NLP, word sense disambiguation, parsing, semantic role labeling, and the capabilities of language models. It is important to note that this is not an exhaustive list, and there are many other relevant articles published in this area
